import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const NavBar = (props) => { const navToggler = document.querySelector("navbar-toggler"); const navItems = document.getElementsByClassName("nav-item"); const activateItem = (item) => { for (const navItem of navItems) { navItem.classList.remove("active"); } item.classList.add("active"); }; return (
  • Statistics

  • About
); }; export default NavBar;
